thread.title: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term
thread.title_full: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term

title: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term
text: > Top News Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term President Barack Obama pats Education Secretary Arne Duncan's back in the State Dining Room of the White House in Washington, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, as Duncan announced that he will be stepping down in December after 7 years in the Obama administration. Duncan will be returning to Chicago and Obama has appointed senior Education Department official, John King Jr., to oversee the Education Department. (AP Photo/Pablo Martinez Monsivais)
